findings.description: List of personal data findings from GDPR compliance analysis

type.description: Type of personal data found (e.g., email, phone, ssn, health_data)

data_type.description: Categorical data type identifier from GDPR classification (e.g., basic_profile, health_data)

risk_level.description: Risk level associated with this type of personal data

special_category.description: Whether this is GDPR Article 9 special category data

matched_pattern.description: The specific pattern that was matched

compliance.description: Compliance information with regulation names and specific relevance

collection_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the evidence was collected

evidence.description: Array of evidence objects with content and collection timestamps

metadata.description: Metadata from the original data source including source location

source.description: Source file or location where the data was found

summary.description: Summary statistics of the personal data analysis

total_findings.description: Total number of personal data findings

high_risk_count.description: Number of high-risk personal data findings

special_category_count.description: Number of special category personal data findings under GDPR
